CustomField.description: "0" indicates no email will be sent. To auto-email the generated doc(s), set to "1". "Doclist" must contain a Template ID with fomat set to "HTML" (this will become the email body) and must also set the "to" and "subject" fields for the outbound email.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "0" indicates no email will be sent. To auto-email the generated doc(s), set to "1". "Doclist" must contain a Template ID with fomat set to "HTML" (this will become the email body) and must also set the "to" and "subject" fields for the outbound email.
CustomField.label: Send Email
